ygData.subject: go try another class..
ygData.msgSnippet: ... this just makes my think that we should be doing more damage, or have ... mana regen, or SOMETHING. Just another example of how Verant has made the wizard
ygData.messageBody:
>I know at 29 I will get Inferno Shock, but
this just makes my think that we should be doing more damage, or have
>faster
mana regen, or SOMETHING. Just another example of how Verant has made >the
wizard class suck.
>Greg (Kronan on Innoruuk)

*scratch scratch* Huh? 2 levels can make a world of difference. Heck, even
ONE level can make a difference...that's almost 70pts damage between a level
28 and 29 Wizard. I don't see your argument.

Believe me...I can't wait for 2 more levels. 29 is going to be a damn fun
level I predict. :) (Boy this 5 level stretch is a toughie!)

-- Lim'Dul
